doc.field: - A Coca Cola Co spokesman said rumors the company is interested in acquiring Wendy's International [WEN] are not true. "Those rumors are not correct," said Carlton Curtis, an assistant vice president at Coke. "We have stated many times that Coca Cola Co has no interest in an acquisition in the food service industry and thereby becoming a competitor to our food service customers." Wendy's stock has been flying high on the rumors for two days. Today, Wendy's hit a high of 13-3/8 before dropping back to 12-3/8, up 5/8 in heavy trading.
